meanings.definition: A genetically identical individual produced asexually from a parent plant.
meanings.sent1: The ramets spread quickly across the field.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with ramets of the same flower.
meanings.sent3: The ramets decided to have a race to see who could grow the tallest.
meanings.sent4: The ramets intertwined their roots like a secret handshake.
meanings.sent5: Each ramet was like a mirror image of the parent plant.

meanings.definition: A cluster of individual plants that are genetically identical and connected underground.
meanings.sent1: The ramets formed a tight-knit community beneath the surface.
meanings.sent2: The farmer discovered a network of ramets while digging.
meanings.sent3: The ramets threw a party underground, complete with root music.
meanings.sent4: The ramets were like siblings sharing a hidden bond.
meanings.sent5: The ramets communicated through their interconnected roots.
